pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scmxlate is a configuration tool for software packages written in Scheme. Scmxlate provides the package author with a strategy for programmatically specifying the changes required to translate the package for a variety of Scheme dialects and Common Lisp, and a variety of operating systems. The end-user simply loads one file into their Scheme or Common Lisp, which triggers the entire configuration process with little or no further intervention.
